mapper.select: SELECT STUDENT_ID, STATUS_NO, STUDENT_STATUS, APPLICATION_STATUS, APPLICATION_DATE, REASONS_LEAVE, LEAVE_PERIOD, LEAVE_DATE, RETURNING_DATE FROM TB_STUDENT LEFT JOIN TB_STUDENT_STATUS USING(STUDENT_ID) WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{stdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STUDENT_STATUS (STATUS_NO, STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_STATUS, APPLICATION_STATUS, APPLICATION_DATE, REASONS_LEAVE, LEAVE_PERIOD, LEAVE_DATE, RETURNING_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_STATUS.NEXTVAL, #{stdId}, #{stdStatus}, #{applicationStatus}, #{applicationDate}, #{reasonsLeave}, #{leavePeriod},#{leaveDate},#{returningDate})
